item.title: Appendix A: Standard Environment
item.description: Introduction This section is referred to by other parts of the reference to increase readability and clarity. It is a summary of the Standard Environment provided by creators of CLEAN.

item.title: Appendix B: Code recipes
item.description: Table of contents Introduction Breaking an integer into its digits Computing divisors of an integer Checking if an integer is prime or not Introduction This section contains a collection of common and useful functions.
